snippet: None of the 10 fires reported to the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration have caused any injuries, but the blazes have destroyed at least six vehicles.
abstract: National Highway Traffic Safety Administration is investigating reports of engine fires in the 2011 Chevrolet Cruze and the 2010 Jeep Wrangler.
lead_paragraph: None of the 10 fires reported to the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration have caused any injuries, but the blazes have destroyed at least six vehicles.
